Feb. 9, 2018 D Norwegian National Championships (Elite Division)

Norway
Elite
Aubade (Dawn Songs of the Fabulous Birds)
Grieghallen (Griegsalen), Bergen, Hordaland, Norway Set Test (Friday): 15:30 - 21:00 (Stig Nordhagen, Håkon Berge and PK Svendsen) Own Choice (Saturday): 14:45 - 20.15 (Niels-Ole Bo Johansen, Jan Fredrik Christiansen and Davur Magnussen)

Best section: Trombones - Manger Musikklag
